function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Substantial underestimation of infection cases in some areas during the early stage of the pandemic","category":"Misinterpretation of data and recirculation","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Nanoparticle health risks","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate use and handling of masks","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close-contact aerosol transmission of
